page.title: 15ACTIVITIES IN STOKE FLEMING
page.content: Stoke Fleming is a very active village.In the centre of the village is the{Parish Hall}and next to it is the{Youth Club Hall.}The youth club meets on Wednesdays and also holds Discos.At the Parish Hall are held Brownies, Cubs, Guides, Play Group for the under fives,Jumble Sales, Dances, Womens Institute and Keep Fit Classes. There is a{playing field}with a childrens play area containing swings, a slide, a climbing frame , see saw and sandpit. On the field football and cricket matches are played. In August there is a{Horticultural Show}with Sports. The village has its own {Bowling Club}with a Green and Clubhouse. The pubs,{The Green Dragon and{The London Inn,}are also popular places.
